name: Oblivious (Rudy_AA)
description:
"I don't know what to do anymore, I am so lost... my mind is spiraling out of control... who am I?"

Oblivious is a first-person scifi psychological thriller game set in the year 2249 in a forest controlled by a big mysterious satellite. Voices of people suffering from psychological distress can be heard around the forest. Explore the forest to discover the truth behind these voices.

Key features:

  • A 10-15 minutes experience that can be completed in one sitting
  • An experience that focuses on atmosphere rather than action or puzzles
  • Emotionally charged and moving
  • A rich and detailed high quality environment
  • High quality sound effects and epic music tracks

Release date: July 1st 2022

PreOrder now for a 50% discount

Follow us on twitter for news about the launch https://twitter.com/Oblivious_devs
